API Docs for Sandy 3D Engine haXe Port, ver. 3.1.x trunk

sandy.view.Frustum

type
class
version
3.1
Used to create the frustum of the camera.

The frustum is volume used to control if geometrical object, such as a box, a sphere, or a point can be seen by the camera, and thus should be rendered.

Clipping of objects and polygons is performed against the frustum surfaces, as well as the near and far planes.

Static Variables

BOTTOM : Int

EPSILON : Float

FAR : Int

INSIDE : Int

INTERSECT : Int

LEFT : Int

NEAR : Int

OUTSIDE : Int

RIGHT : Int

TOP : Int

Constructor

new()
Creates a frustum for the camera.

This constructor only creates the necessay data structures

Instance Variables

aConstants : sandy.TypedArray<Float>

aNormals : sandy.TypedArray<sandy.core.data.Vertex>

aPlanes : sandy.TypedArray<sandy.core.data.Plane>

aPoints : sandy.TypedArray<sandy.core.data.Point3D>

Instance Methods

boxInFrustum(p_oBox : sandy.bounds.BBox) : Int

parameters
p_oS The box to test
Returns the culling state for the passed bounding box.

The method tests if the bounding box is within the frustum volume or not.
The returned culling state is Frustum.INSIDE, Frustum.OUTSIDE or Frustum.INTERSECT

clipFrontPlane(p_aCvert : Array<sandy.core.data.Vertex>, p_aUVCoords : Array<sandy.core.data.UVCoord>) : Bool

parameters
p_aCvert Vertices of the polygon.
p_aUVCoords UV coordiantes of the polygon.
Clips a polygon against the front frustum plane.

clipFrustum(p_aCvert : Array<sandy.core.data.Vertex>, p_aUVCoords : Array<sandy.core.data.UVCoord>) : Bool

parameters
p_aCvert Vertices of the polygon
p_aUVCoords UV coordiantes of the polygon
Clips a polygon against the frustum planes

clipLineFrontPlane(p_aCvert : Array<sandy.core.data.Vertex>) : Bool

parameters
p_aCvert Vertices of the line.
Clip the given vertex and UVCoords arrays against the frustum front plane.

clipPolygon(p_oPlane : sandy.core.data.Plane, p_aCvert : Array<sandy.core.data.Vertex>, p_aUVCoords : Array<sandy.core.data.UVCoord>) : Bool

computePlanes(p_nAspect : Float, p_nNear : Float, p_nFar : Float, p_nFov : Float) : Void

parameters
p_nAspect Aspect ration of the camera
p_nNear The distance from the camera to the near clipping plane
p_nFar The distance from the camera to the far clipping plane
p_nFov Vertical field of view of the camera
Computes the frustum planes.

pointInFrustum(p_oPoint : sandy.core.data.Point3D) : Int

parameters
p_oPoint The point to test
Returns the culling state for the passed point.

The method tests if the passed point is within the frustum volume or not.
The returned culling state is Frustum.INSIDE or Frustum.OUTSIDE

polygonInFrustum(p_oPoly : sandy.core.data.Polygon) : Int

parameters
p_oPoly The polygon to test
returns
The culling state of the polygon
Helping function to test a polygon against the frustum

The method tests if the passed polygon is inside the frustum, outside or intersecting the frustum

sphereInFrustum(p_oS : sandy.bounds.BSphere) : Int

parameters
p_oS The sphere to test
Returns the culling state for the passed bounding sphere.

The method tests if the bounding sphere is within the frustum volume or not.
The returned culling state is Frustum.INSIDE, Frustum.OUTSIDE or Frustum.INTERSECT
